Trigger.name: kopalnia_zawal_warning
Trigger.script:
if __IS_MINING_ON__ == false then return end
--math.randomseed( os.time() ) --local rnd = math.random (51,225) * 0.01 -- 0.5 to 2s __MINING_TRIGGER_RANDOM__ = math.random (513,2273) * 0.001 local rnd = __MINING_TRIGGER_RANDOM__
local deactivated = false
if __IS__STOP__TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == true then echo("\nrnd = " .. rnd .. "\n") tempTimer( rnd, [[send("przestan")]] ) __IS__STOP__TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = false deactivated = true cecho("<yellow> Trigger deactivated. Stop command sent.\n") end
-- Activate the script again if __IS__STOP__TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == false and deactivated == true then cecho("<yellow> Trigger activation in 60s\n") tempTimer( 60, [[__IS__STOP__TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = true]] ) end

local rnd = math.random (981,3151) * 0.01
local deactivated = false
if __IS__STOP_FATIGUE_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == true then echo("\nrnd = " .. rnd .. "\n") tempTimer( rnd, [[send("przestan")]] ) __IS__STOP_FATIGUE_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = false deactivated = true --cecho("<yellow> Trigger deactivated. Stop command sent.\n") end
-- Activate the script again if __IS__STOP_FATIGUE_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == false and deactivated == true then --cecho("<yellow> Trigger activation in 120s\n") tempTimer( 120, [[__IS__STOP_FATIGUE_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = true]] ) end

Trigger.name: mining_fatigue_recovered

Trigger.name: nagle_dostrzegasz
Trigger.script:
if __IS_FISHING_ON__ == false then return end local rnd = math.random (980,3283) * 0.001
cecho("\n<yellow>Rnd = " .. rnd .. "\n<reset>")
if rnd > 3 then cecho("<yellow>Bonus time!\n<reset>") rnd = rnd + (math.random (211,1283) * 0.001) cecho("<yellow>Rnd = " .. rnd .. "\n<reset>") end
if rnd > 4 then cecho("<yellow>Additional bonus time!\n<reset>") rnd = rnd + (math.random (555,1888) * 0.001) cecho("<yellow>Rnd = " .. rnd .. "\n<reset>") end
local deactivated = false
if __IS_FISHING_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == true then tempTimer( rnd, [[send("zatnij rybe na wedce")]] )
__IS_FISHING_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = false deactivated = true end
-- Activate the script again if __IS_FISHING_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ == false and deactivated == true then tempTimer( 60, [[__IS_FISHING_TRIGGER_ACTIVE__ = true]] ) end

Alias.name: roomAddTest
addTestRoom
mapperTest
addKnownRoom
Alias.script:
if __IS_MAPPING_MODE_ON__ == false then cecho("<red>Error: Mapping mode is on. Use m mapon to turn on the mapper.
<reset>") return end
if gmcp.room.info.map == nil then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add this room manually
<reset>") return end
if __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ == nil then cecho("<red>Error: Current area is not set<reset>
") return end
local domain = string.lower(gmcp.room.info.map.domain) local name = string.lower(gmcp.room.info.map.name) local x = tonumber(gmcp.room.info.map.x) local y = tonumber(gmcp.room.info.map.y) local z = 0 -- for known map z is always 0 local offsetKeyX = domain .. "_" .. name .. "_x" local offsetKeyY = domain .. "_" .. name .. "_y"
echo("offsetX = " .. offsetKeyX .. "
")
if mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyX] == nil then cecho("<red>Error: offset table does not contain a proper key
<reset>") return end
--x = x + mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyX] --y = y + mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyY] x = mmpOffsets.knownToMapX(x, mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyX]) y = mmpOffsets.knownToMapY(y, mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyY])
echo("x = " .. x .. "
") echo("y = " .. y .. "
") echo("z = " .. z .. "
") echo("domain = " .. domain .. "
") echo("name = " .. name .. "
")
local roomId = createRoomID() --addRoom(roomId) --setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) --setRoomArea(roomId, __CURRENT_AREA_ID__)
success = mmp.addRoom(__CURRENT_AREA_ID__, roomId, x, y, z)
if success == true then cecho("<yellow>Room added. Id = " .. roomId .. " (" .. x .. ", " .. y .. ", " .. z .. ")
<reset>") __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId __LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ centerview(roomId) else cecho("<red>Error: room was not added!
<reset>") end

Alias.name: addVisibleExits

") end

") return end
local x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(roomId) local areaId = getRoomArea(roomId) local areaName = getRoomAreaName(areaId)

")

") cecho("<yellow>y = " .. y .. "
") cecho("<yellow>area = " .. areaName .. "
")

") local normalExits = getRoomExits(roomId) local specialExits = getSpecialExits(roomId)

cecho("<yellow>Special exits: 
") display(specialExits)

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- compass = compass or {} compass.dirs = {"polnocny-zachod", "polnoc", "polnocny-wschod"} compass.back = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.back", x = "-32%", y = "55%", width = "10%", height = "10%", }, main) -- Create 3x3 grid compass.box = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "compass.box", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },compass.back) compass.row1 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row1", },compass.box) compass.row2 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row2", },compass.box) compass.row3 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row3", },compass.box) -- Add 9 labels for every compass direction compass.msgFormatLeft = "
" compass.msgFormaRight = "
" compass.nw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.nw", --message = " " .. compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. compass.msgFormaRight .. " ", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.w = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.w", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "W" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.sw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.sw", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "SW" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.n = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.n", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "N" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row2) compass.center = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.center", },compass.row2) compass.s = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.s", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "S" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row2) compass.ne = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.ne", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NE" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) compass.e = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.e", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "E" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) compass.se = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.se", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "SE" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) function compass.refreshLabels() exits = gmcp.room.info.exits if exits == nil then compass:nwOff() compass:nOff() compass:neOff() compass:eOff() compass:seOff() compass:sOff() compass:swOff() compass:wOff() return end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-zachod") then compass:nwOn() else compass:nwOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnoc") then compass:nOn() else compass:nOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-wschod") then compass:neOn() else compass:neOff() end if table.contains(exits, "wschod") then compass:eOn() else compass:eOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-wschod") then compass:seOn() else compass:seOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludnie") then compass:sOn() else compass:sOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-zachod") then compass:swOn() else compass:swOff() end if table.contains(exits, "zachod") then compass:wOn() else compass:wOff() end end function compassScript() compass:resize() compass:refreshLabels() end function compass.resize() compass.back:resize(compass.back:get_height(),compass.back:get_height()) end -- set styles compass.borderWidth = "1px;" compass.borderStyle = "solid;" compass.borderRadius = "1px;" compass.bgOnColor = "rgba(90,90,90,100%);" compass.borderOnColor = "rgba(120,120,120,100%);" compass.bgOffColor = "rgba(30,30,30,100%);" compass.borderOffColor = "rgba30,30,30,100%);" compass.styleOn = [[ background-color: ]] .. compass.bgOnColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. compass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. compass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. compass.borderOnColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. compass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] compass.styleOff = [[ background-color: ]] .. compass.bgOffColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. compass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. compass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. compass.borderOffColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. compass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] -- On ------------------------------------ function compass.nwOn() --compass.n:setColor(0, 255, 0) compass.nw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) --compass.nw:echo("NW", nil, "c") end function compass.nOn() compass.n:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) --compass.n:echo("N", nil, "c") end function compass.neOn() compass.ne:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.eOn() compass.e:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.seOn() compass.se:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.sOn() compass.s:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.swOn() compass.sw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.wOn() compass.w:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end -- Off ------------------------------------ function compass.nwOff() compass.nw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.nOff() compass.n:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.neOff() compass.ne:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.eOff() compass.e:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.seOff() compass.se:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.sOff() compass.s:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.swOff() compass.sw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.wOff() compass.w:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end

statusBars.frontBackgroundColor = "QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #98f041, stop: 0.1 #8cf029, stop: 0.49 #66cc00, stop: 0.5 #52a300, stop: 1 #66cc00);" black solid;" statusBars.borderLeft = "1px black solid;" statusBars.borderBottom = "1px black solid;" statusBars.radius = "7;" statusBars.padding = "3px;" statusBars.frontStyle = [[ background-color: ]] .. statusBars.frontBackgroundColor .. __STATUS_BARS_COLORFULL__ == true then statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,0,0,100%);" statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,0,0,100%);" statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,90,100%);" statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(220,220,0,100%);" statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(102,51,0,100%);" statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,255,255,100%);" statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,51,51,100%);" statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(51,255,51,100%);" statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,102,0,100%);" statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,255,128,100%);" statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,102,51,100%);" statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(127,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(51,0,102,100%);" else -- Define colors statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,0,0,100%);" statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,0,0,100%);" statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,90,100%);" statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(220,220,0,100%);" statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,90,0,100%);" statusBars.frontEncumberanceBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backEncumberanceBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" end -- Set styles statusBars.hpBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor)) statusBars.hpBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor)) statusBars.manaBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor)) statusBars.manaBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor)) statusBars.fatigueBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor)) statusBars.fatigueBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor)) statusBars.encumberanceBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontEncumberanceBackgroundColor)) statusBars.encumberanceBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backEncumberanceBackgroundColor)) statusBars.panicBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontPanicBackgroundColor)) statusBars.panicBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backPanicBackgroundColor)) statusBars.stuffedBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontStuffedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.stuffedBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backStuffedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.soakedBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.soakedBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.intoxBar .front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor)) statusBars.intoxBar .back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor)) statusBars.headacheBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor)) statusBars.headacheBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor)) statusBars.improveBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor)) statusBars.improveBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor)) function statusBars.updateStatus() if (gmcp.char.state.hp) then statusBars:updateHp() end if (gmcp.char.state.mana) then statusBars:updateMana() end if (gmcp.char.state.fatigue) then statusBars:updateFatigue() end if (gmcp.char.state.encumberance) then statusBars:updateEncumberance() end if (gmcp.char.state.panic) then statusBars.updatePanic() end if (gmcp.char.state.stuffed) then statusBars.updateStuffed() end if (gmcp.char.state.soaked) then statusBars.updateSoaked() end if (gmcp.char.state.intox) then statusBars.updateIntox() end if (gmcp.char.state.headache) then statusBars.updateHeadache() end if (gmcp.char.state.improve) then statusBars.updateImprove() end end function statusBars.updateHp() local currentHp = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.hp) local maxHp = 6 local statusStr = "Kondycja: " if (currentHp == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ledwo zywy" elseif (currentHp == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ciezko ranny" elseif (currentHp == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w zlej kondycji" elseif (currentHp == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ranny" elseif (currentHp == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko ranny" elseif (currentHp == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w dobrym stanie" elseif (currentHp == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w swietnej kondycji" end statusBars.hpBar:setValue(currentHp, maxHp) statusBars.hpLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateMana() local currentMana = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.mana) local maxMana = 8 local statusStr = "Mana: " if (currentMana == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "u kresu sil" elseif (currentMana == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wykonczony" elseif (currentMana == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wyczerpany" elseif (currentMana == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w zlej kondycji" elseif (currentMana == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo zmeczony" elseif (currentMana == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "zmeczony" elseif (currentMana == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "oslabiony" elseif (currentMana == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko oslabiony" elseif (currentMana == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w pelni sil" end statusBars.manaBar:setValue(currentMana, maxMana) statusBars.manaLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateFatigue() local currentFatigue = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.fatigue) local maxFatigue = 9 local statusStr = "Zmeczenie: " if (currentFatigue == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w pelni wypoczety" elseif (currentFatigue == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wypoczety" elseif (currentFatigue == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "troche zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieco wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wycienczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 9) then statusStr = statusStr .. "calkowicie wycienczony" end --statusBars.fatigueBar:setValue(currentFatigue, maxFatigue, ""..statusStr.."") statusBars.fatigueBar:setValue(currentFatigue, maxFatigue) statusBars.fatigueLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateEncumberance() local currentEncumberance = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.encumberance) local maxEncumberance = 6 local statusStr = "Eq: " if (currentEncumberance == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "brak obc." elseif (currentEncumberance == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wadzi ci troche" elseif (currentEncumberance == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "daje ci sie we znaki" elseif (currentEncumberance == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest dosyc klopotliwy" elseif (currentEncumberance == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest wyjatkowo ciezki" elseif (currentEncumberance == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest niemilosiernie ciezki" elseif (currentEncumberance == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "prawie przygniata cie do ziemi" end statusBars.encumberanceBar:setValue(currentEncumberance, maxEncumberance) statusBars.encumberanceLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updatePanic() local currentPanic = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.panic) local maxPanic = 5 local statusStr = "Strach: " if (currentPanic == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bezpiecznie" elseif (currentPanic == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "spokojnie" elseif (currentPanic == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieswojo" elseif (currentPanic == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nerwowo" elseif (currentPanic == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "przerazony" elseif (currentPanic == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo przerazony" end statusBars.panicBar:setValue(currentPanic, maxPanic) statusBars.panicLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateStuffed() local currentStuffed = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.stuffed) local maxStuffed = 3 local statusStr = "Glod: " if (currentStuffed == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo glody" elseif (currentStuffed == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "glodny" elseif (currentStuffed == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. " .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateSoaked() local currentSoaked = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.soaked) local maxSoaked = 3 local statusStr = "Pragnienie: " if (currentSoaked == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "chce si sie bardzo pic" elseif (currentSoaked == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "chce ci sie pic" elseif (currentSoaked == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nie chce ci sie pic" end statusBars.soakedBar:setValue(maxSoaked - currentSoaked, maxSoaked) statusBars.soakedLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "

"trzezwy" elseif (currentIntox == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "podchmielony" elseif (currentIntox == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko podpity" elseif (currentIntox == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wstawiony" elseif (currentIntox == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. " .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateHeadache() local currentHeadache = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.headache) local maxHeadache = 6 local statusStr = "Kac: " if (currentHeadache == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "brak kaca" elseif (currentHeadache == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekki" elseif (currentHeadache == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. " .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateImprove() local currentImprove = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.improve) local maxImprove = 15 local statusStr = "Postepy: " if (currentImprove == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. Script.name: mapperTestScript
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
-- mapper functions: -- http://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Mapper_Functions#createRoomID
-- mapping script: -- http://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Mapping_script
--mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true
--__IS_DEBUG_ON__ = true --__IS_MAPPER_MODE_ON__ = false --__CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = nil --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil --__LAST_ROOM_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited room id --__LAST_AREA_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited area --__IS_MAPPING_MODE_ON__ = false
--_LAST_AREA_ID = nil --_LAST_ROOM_ID = nil --_CURRENT_ROOM_ID = nil
--mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true --mapperScript = mapperScript or {}
--local main = Geyser.Container:new({x=0,y=0,width="100%",height="100%",name="mapperContainer"})
mapperScript.mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ name = "mapperScript.mapper", x = "70%", y = 0, -- edit here if you want to move it width = "30%", height = "50%" }, main)
function mapperScript.CreateFirstLocation() cecho("<yellow> Creating first location\n<reset>") end
function mapperScript.createRoom(areaName, x, y, z) if mapperScript.areaExists(areaName) then local roomId = createRoomID() local areaId = mapperScript.findAreaID(areaName) addRoom(roomID) setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) end end
function mapperScript.areaExists(areaname) local id, msg = mapperScript.findAreaID(areaname) if id then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("Area: " .. areaname .. " already exists\n") end return true else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("Area: " .. areaname .. " does no exist\n") end return false end end
-- using the sample findAreaID() function defined in the getAreaTable() example, -- we'll define a function that echo's us a nice list of all rooms in an area with their ID function mapperScript.roomExistsArNm(areaname, x, y, z) local id, msg = mapperScript.findAreaID(areaname) if id then local roomlist, endresult = getAreaRooms(id), {} if table.size(roomlist) < 1 then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("There are no rooms in this area\n") end return false end
local eX, eY, eZ
-- obtain a room list for each of the room IDs we got -- for key, value in pairs(table) do ... for _, id in ipairs(roomlist) do --endresult[id] = getRoomName(id) local eX, eY, eZ = getRoomCoordinates(id) if (eX == x and eY == y and eZ == z) then return true end end
return false
elseif not id and msg then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>ID not found; " .. msg .. "\n<reset>") end return false else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>No areas matched the query.\n<reset>") end return false end end
function mapperScript.roomExistsArId(areaId, x, y, z) if areaId then local roomlist, endresult = getAreaRooms(areaId), {} if table.size(roomlist) < 1 then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("There are no rooms in this area\n") end return false end
local eX, eY, eZ
-- obtain a room list for each of the room IDs we got -- for key, value in pairs(table) do ... for _, id in ipairs(roomlist) do --endresult[id] = getRoomName(id) local eX, eY, eZ = getRoomCoordinates(id) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("Checking coordinates: (".. eX .. ", " .. eY .. ", " .. eZ .. ")\n") end if (eX == x and eY == y and eZ == z) then return true end end
return false
elseif not id and msg then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>ID not found; " .. msg .. "\n<reset>") end return false else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>No areas matched the query.\n<reset>") end return false end end
-- example function that returns the area ID for a given area function mapperScript.findAreaID(areaname) local list = getAreaTable()
-- iterate over the list of areas, matching them with substring match. -- if we get match a single area, then return it's ID, otherwise return -- 'false' and a message that there are than one are matches local returnid, fullareaname for area, id in pairs(list) do if area:find(areaname, 1, true) then if returnid then return false, "more than one area matches" end returnid = id; fullareaname = area end end
return returnid, fullareaname end
function mapperScript.createArea(areaName) local t = getAreaTable(); local tr = {}; for k,v in pairs(t) do tr[v] = k end local newid = table.maxn(tr) + 1
setAreaName( newid, areaName) end

Script.name: mmpOffsets
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
--przygotowaniu tekstowych map (szerokosc 120 znakow, wysokosc dowolna) --http://arkadia.rpg.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=588&hilit=mapy+www
mmpOffsets = mmpOffsets or {}
function mmpOffsets.knownToMapX(knownX, offsetX) local x = knownX + offsetX return x end
function mmpOffsets.knownToMapY(knownY, offsetY) -- y is equal to 0 at top of each map so when it increases -- the real y decreases and vice versa local y = -knownY + offsetY return y end
-- Nuln center square mmpOffsets.zeroX = -77 mmpOffsets.zeroY = -39
-- How much should we add to get our map (0, 0) mmpOffsets.offsets = {} -- arkadia default (0, 0) is TOP left mmpOffsets.offsets["imperium_nuln_x"] = 0 mmpOffsets.offsets["imperium_nuln_y"] = 0
mmpOffsets.offsets["imperium_stirland_x"] = 56 mmpOffsets.offsets["imperium_stirland_y"] = -37

Script.name: mmpTrackingScript
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
mmpTracking = mmpTracking or {}
function mmpTrackingScript()
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>mmpTrakcking invoked.\n<reset>") end
if __IS_TRACKING_ON__ == false then return end
if gmcp.room.info.map == nil then --TODO: Invoke manual tracking (from input) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add this room manually\n<reset>") end return else mmpTracking.knownMapTracking() end
end
function mmpTracking.knownMapTracking() local domain = string.lower(gmcp.room.info.map.domain) local name = string.lower(gmcp.room.info.map.name) local x = tonumber(gmcp.room.info.map.x) local y = tonumber(gmcp.room.info.map.y) local z = 0 -- for known map z is always 0 local offsetKeyX = domain .. "_" .. name .. "_x" local offsetKeyY = domain .. "_" .. name .. "_y"
if mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyX] == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: offset table does not contain a proper key\n<reset>") end return end
x = mmpOffsets.knownToMapX(x, mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyX]) y = mmpOffsets.knownToMapY(y, mmpOffsets.offsets[offsetKeyY])
local roomIds = getRoomsByPosition(__CURRENT_AREA_ID__, x, y, z) display(getRoomsByPosition(__CURRENT_AREA_ID__, x, y, z)) if next(roomIds) ~= nil then --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Centering. Room id = " .. roomIds[0] .. "\n<reset>") end __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId centerview(roomIds[0]) else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room id is nil\n<reset>") end end
end

Script.name: herbsIdentification
globalFunctions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
globalFunctions = globalFunctions or {}
function globalFunctions.deleteWhiteSpaces(str) str = string.gsub(str, "%s+", "_") return str end
function globalFunctions.liczby(s) a = utils.split (s, " ") sum = 0 for k, t in pairs (a) do if t == "jedno" then w=1 elseif t == "jednej" then w=1 elseif t == "jedna" then w=1 elseif t == "jednego" then w=1 elseif t == "pierwsza" then w=1 elseif t == "pierwszy" then w=1 elseif t == "dwa" then w=2 elseif t == "dwie" then w=2 elseif t == "druga" then w=2 elseif t == "drugi" then w=2 elseif t == "dwoch" then w=2 elseif t == "trzy" then w=3 elseif t == "trzech" then w=3 elseif t == "trzeci" then w=3 elseif t == "trzecia" then w=3 elseif t == "cztery" then w=4 elseif t == "czterech" then w=4 elseif t == "czwarta" then w=4 elseif t == "czwarty" then w=4 elseif t == "piec" then w=5 elseif t == "pieciu" then w=5 elseif t == "piata" then w=5 elseif t == "piaty" then w=5 elseif t == "szesc" then w=6 elseif t == "szesciu" then w=6 elseif t == "szosta" then w=6 elseif t == "szosty" then w=6 elseif t == "siedem" then w=7 elseif t == "siedmiu" then w=7 elseif t == "siodma" then w=7 elseif t == "siodmy" then w=7 elseif t == "osiem" then w=8 elseif t == "osmiu" then w=8 elseif t == "osma" then w=8 elseif t == "osmy" then w=8 elseif t == "dziewiec" then w=9 elseif t == "dziewieciu" then w=9 elseif t == "dziewiata" then w=9 elseif t == "dziewiaty" then w=9 elseif t == "dziesiec" then w=10 elseif t == "dziesieciu" then w=10 elseif t == "dziesiata" then w=10 elseif t == "dziesiaty" then w=10 elseif t == "jedenascie" then w=11 elseif t == "jedenasta" then w=11 elseif t == "jedenasty" then w=11 elseif t == "dwanascie" then w=12 elseif t == "dwunasta" then w=12 elseif t == "dwunasty" then w=12 elseif t == "trzynascie" then w=13 elseif t == "trzynasta" then w=13 elseif t == "trzynasty" then w=13 elseif t == "czternascie" then w=14 elseif t == "czternasta" then w=14 elseif t == "czternasty" then w=14 elseif t == "pietnascie" then w=15 elseif t == "pietnasta" then w=15 elseif t == "pietnasty" then w=15 elseif t == "szesnascie" then w=16 elseif t == "szesnasta" then w=16 elseif t == "szesnasty" then w=16 elseif t == "siedemnascie" then w=17 elseif t == "siedemnasta" then w=17 elseif t == "siedemnasty" then w=17 elseif t == "osiemnascie" then w=18 elseif t == "osiemnasta" then w=18 elseif t == "osiemnasty" then w=18 elseif t == "dziewietnascie" then w=19 elseif t == "dziewietnasta" then w=19 elseif t == "dziewietnasty" then w=19 elseif t == "dwadziescia" then w=20 elseif t == "dwudziesta" then w=20 elseif t == "dwudziesty" then w=20 elseif t == "trzydziesta" then w=30 elseif t == "trzydziesty" then w=30 elseif t == "czterdziesta" then w=40 elseif t == "piecdziesiata" then w=50 elseif t == "szescdziesiata" then w=60 elseif t == "siedemdziesiata" then w=70 elseif t == "osiemdziesiata" then w=80 elseif t == "dziewiecdziesiata" then w=90 else w=0 end sum = sum + w end return sum end -- of liczby

Script.name: roomChanged
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
--Remember: -- Last area (if we entered a cave it was from there -- Last move command
roomChg = roomChg or {}
function roomChanged() rLstCmd.addQueued()
if __IS_MAPPING_ON__ == false then roomChg.clearCmdList() roomChg.assignLastMoveCommand() roomChg.trackPosition() return end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Room changed\n") end if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("1. Updating position \n") end roomChg.updatePosition() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("2. Clearing command list \n") end roomChg.clearCmdList() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("3. Assigning last move command \n") end roomChg.assignLastMoveCommand() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("4. Last move command assigned \n") end if gmcp.room.info.map ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("5.1.1 Adding known room \n") end roomChg.addKnownRoom() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("5.1.2 Adding known room \n") end roomChg.connectPrevToCurrent() else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("5.2 Adding unknown room \n") end roomChg.addUnknownRoomGMCP() end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("6. Connecting previous to current \n") end --roomChg.connectPrevToCurrent() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("7. Writing exits\n") end roomChg.writeExits() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("8. Done\n") end end
function roomChg.addKnownRoom() local map = gmcp.room.info.map
if map == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Location unknown") end return false end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Location known\n") end local x = gmcp.room.info.map.x local y = gmcp.room.info.map.y local z = 0 local area = gmcp.room.info.map.name local domain = gmcp.room.info.map.domain
-- Because map (0, 0) is in top-left corner y = -y
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then roomChg.printRoomData(x, y, area, domain) end
-- Add area if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding area\n") end local areaName = domain.. ":" .. area .. ":Known" areaName = globalFunctions.deleteWhiteSpaces(areaName) local areaId = roomChg.AddArea(areaName)
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("areaId = " .. areaId .. "\n") end -- Add room if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding room\n") end local roomId = roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z)
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomId = " .. roomId .. "\n") end if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Centering view\n") end mmp.centerView(roomId)
__LAST_POS_X__ = x __LAST_POS_Y__ = y __LAST_POS_Z__ = z
__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__ = roomId
--Delete old stubs mmp.deleteAllStubs(roomId)
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding visible exits\n") end mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId)
if __IS_CONNECTING_STUBS__ == true then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Connecting exit stubs\n") end roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("roomChg -> addKnownRoom -> stubs connected.\n") end else mmp.connectLastReverse(roomId) end
--__LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId
--__LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ --__CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId
return true end
function roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z) local roomId = mmp.addRoom(areaId, x, y, z) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>View centered") end __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId
__LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId return roomId end
function roomChg.AddArea(areaName) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> Start\n") end local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName)
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> check if is nil\n") end if (areaId == nil) then areaId = mmp.addArea(areaName) end
if (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (areaId ~= nil) then cecho("<yellow>areaId = " .. areaId .. "\n") end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> returning id = " .. areaId .. "\n") end return areaId end
function roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) mmp.connectExitStubs(roomId) end
function roomChg.updateLastLocation() __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ __LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ --setRoomEnv(__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.envColors.default) end
function roomChg.printRoomData(x, y, area, domain) cecho("<yellow>x = " .. x .. "\n") cecho("<yellow>y = " .. y .. "\n") cecho("<yellow>area = " .. area .. "\n") cecho("<yellow>domain = " .. domain .. "\n")
if __LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>LastRoomId = nil\n") end return end
if __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>CurrentRoomId = nil\n") end; return end
end
function roomChg.connectPrevToCurrent() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Start \n") end local lastCommand = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Last move command read \n") end if (not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCommand)) or (lastCommand == nil) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> No exit map for this command. Returning. \n") end return false end
if (__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil) or (__LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Room id == false. Returning. \n") end return false end
local gmcpExits = __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ local isConnected = false
if (gmcpExits == nil) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> no gmcp exits. Returning \n") end return false end
-- This will work only if there was gmpc exit specified. If there was none, it will just return. if (__IS_CONNECT_KNOWN_GMCP_ONLY__) and (not table.contains(gmcpExits, lastCommand)) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> no gmcp exits. Returning \n") end return end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("\n\nCreating one way connection.\n") echo("From room " .. __LAST_ROOM_ID__ .. " to " .. __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ .. " direction: " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. "\n") cecho("<yellow>Dir " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. " <=> " .. lastCommand .. "\n") end
isConnected = mmp.connectFromTo(__LAST_ROOM_ID__, __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.exitmap[lastCommand])
if (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (isConnected == true) then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Connection created\n") elseif (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (isConnected == false) then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Connection not created\n") end
end
function roomChg.addUnknownRoomGMCP()
if gmcp.room.info.map ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Map info present. Returning.\n") end return false end
if gmcp.room.info == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>No GMCP location data. Returning.\n") end return false end
--local lastCmd = __LAST_COMMAND__ local lastCmd = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) if not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCmd) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Command not valid. Returning\n") end return false end
--cecho("<yellow>Last move command = " .. __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ .. "\n") local x, y, z = roomChg.modifyCoords(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__)
-- Like: Imperium:Parravon:Known local areaName = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__)) areaName, _ = string.gsub(areaName, ":Known$", ":Out") local areaId = roomChg.AddArea(areaName) local roomId = roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z) mmp.centerView(roomId) mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId) --roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) -- don't automatically connect stubs roomChg.connectOut() __LAST_POS_X__ = x __LAST_POS_Y__ = y __LAST_POS_Z__ = z return true end
function roomChg.modifyCoords(cmd)
local x = __LAST_POS_X__ local y = __LAST_POS_Y__ local z = __LAST_POS_Z__
if mmp.dirN[cmd] then y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirNE[cmd] then x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirNW[cmd] then x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirE[cmd] then x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirW[cmd] then x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirS[cmd] then y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirSE[cmd] then x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirSW[cmd] then x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirUp[cmd] then z = z + __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirDown[cmd] then z = z - __AREA_SIZE__ elseif mmp.dirOut[cmd] then x = x + __AREA_WIDTH_OFFSET__ elseif mmp.dirIn[cmd] then x = x - __AREA_WIDTH_OFFSET__ end
return x, y, z end
function roomChg.clearCmdList() __CMD_LIST__ = nil __CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end
function roomChg.assignLastMoveCommand() if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then return end
--if next(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) == nil then if table.size(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) < 3 then __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = nil return end
if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__.first > __MOVE_CMD_LIST__.last then __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = nil return end
__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = List.popleft(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) end
function roomChg.writeExits() --if not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, cmd) then return end local exits = gmcp.room.info.exits if exits == nil then __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ = nil if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually\n<reset>") end return end __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ = exits
end
function roomChg.updatePosition() local map = gmcp.room.info.map
if map == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Location unknown") end return false end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Location known\n") end local x = gmcp.room.info.map.x local y = gmcp.room.info.map.y local z = 0
__LAST_POS_X__ = x __LAST_POS_Y__ = -y __LAST_POS_Z__ = z
return true end
function roomChg.connectOut() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Last move command: " .. __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ .. "\n") end local lastCommand = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) if (not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCommand)) or (lastCommand == nil) then return false end
if (__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil) or (__LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil) then return false end
local isConnected = false
isConnected = mmp.connectFromTo(__LAST_ROOM_ID__, __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.exitmap[lastCommand]) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("\n\nCreating one way connection.\n") echo("From room " .. __LAST_ROOM_ID__ .. " to " .. __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ .. " direction: " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. "\n") echo("Dir " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. " <=> " .. lastCommand .. "\n") end
end
function roomChg.trackPosition() if __IS_AUTOMAPPER_ON__ == true then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Automapper is on. Returning. \n") end end
local areaName if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Updating position \n") end if roomChg.updatePosition() == true then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Area known. Updating areaName. \n") end areaName = roomChg.getKnownAreaName() else local x, y, z = roomChg.modifyCoords(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) __LAST_POS_X__ = x __LAST_POS_Y__ = y __LAST_POS_Z__ = z
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Area out. Updating areaName \n") end areaName = roomChg.getOutAreaName() end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Getting area and room ids \n") end local areaId = mmp.getAreaId(areaName) local roomId = mmp.getRoomId(areaId, __LAST_POS_X__, __LAST_POS_Y__, __LAST_POS_Z__)
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Centering the view \n") end if roomId ~= nil then mmp.centerView(roomId)
__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__ = roomId __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId
__LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId else if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Error: Room id = nil. Returning \n") end __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil __CURRENT_AREA_ID_ = nil end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> End. \n") end end
function roomChg.getKnownAreaName() local area = gmcp.room.info.map.name local domain = gmcp.room.info.map.domain
local areaName = domain.. ":" .. area .. ":Known" areaName = globalFunctions.deleteWhiteSpaces(areaName) return areaName end
function roomChg.getOutAreaName() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> getOutAreaName -> Start. \n") end local areaName = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__)) areaName, _ = string.gsub(areaName, ":Known$", ":Out") return areaName end

Script.name: mapperScript
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true
--__IS_DEBUG_ON__ = true --__IS_MAPPER_MODE_ON__ = false --__CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = nil --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil --__LAST_ROOM_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited room id --__LAST_AREA_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited area --__IS_MAPPING_MODE_ON__ = false --__IS_TRACKING_ON__ = true
--_LAST_AREA_ID = nil --_LAST_ROOM_ID = nil --_CURRENT_ROOM_ID = nil
mmp = mmp or {}
mmp.exitmap = { n = 1, north = 1, ne = 2, northeast = 2, nw = 3, northwest = 3, e = 4, east = 4, w = 5, west = 5, s = 6, south = 6, se = 7, southeast = 7, sw = 8, southwest = 8, u = 9, up = 9, d = 10, down = 10, ["in"] = 11, out = 12, [1] = "north", [2] = "northeast", [3] = "northwest", [4] = "east", [5] = "west", [6] = "south", [7] = "southeast", [8] = "southwest", [9] = "up", [10] = "down", [11] = "in", [12] = "out", --[1] = "polnoc", --[2] = "polnocny-wschod", --[3] = "polnocny-zachod", --[4] = "wschod", --[5] = "zachod", --[6] = "poludnie", --[7] = "poludniowy-wschod", --[8] = "poludniowy-zachod", --[9] = "gora", --[10] = "dol", --[11] = "wejscie", --[12] = "wyjscie", ["polnoc"] = 1, ["polnocny-wschod"] = 2, ["polnocny-zachod"] = 3, ["wschod"] = 4, ["zachod"] = 5, ["poludnie"] = 6, ["poludniowy-wschod"] = 7, ["poludniowy-zachod"] = 8, ["g"] = 9, ["gora"] = 9, ["d"] = 10, ["dol"] = 10, ["wejscie"] = 11, ["wyjscie"] = 12, }
mmp.exitmapReversed = { [1] = "south", [2] = "southwest", [3] = "southeast", [4] = "west", [5] = "east", [6] = "north", [7] = "northwest", [8] = "northeast", [9] = "down", [10] = "up", [11] = "out", [12] = "in", }
mmp.dirN = Set { "polnoc", "n" } mmp.dirNE = Set { "polnocny-wschod", "ne" } mmp.dirE = Set { "wschod", "e" } mmp.dirSE = Set { "poludniowy-wschod", "se" } mmp.dirS = Set { "poludnie", "s" } mmp.dirSW = Set { "poludniowy-zachod", "sw" } mmp.dirW = Set { "zachod", "w" } mmp.dirNW = Set { "polnocny-zachod", "nw" } mmp.dirUp = Set { "gora", "g", "wejdz po drabinie", "wespnij sie na gore" } mmp.dirDown = Set { "dol", "d", "jaskinia", "zejdz po drabinie", "zejdz na dol"} mmp.dirIn = Set { "wejscie", "wejdz do baraku" } mmp.dirOut = Set { "wyjscie", "drzwi" }
--setCustomEnvColor(300, 100,100,100,255) --setRoomEnv(roomId, 300) mmp.envColors = { connection = 300, default = 301, forest = 302, water = 303, town = 304, cave = 305, fountain = 306, meadow = 307, sand = 308, harbor = 309, stone = 310, blacksmith = 311, shop = 312, herbalist = 313, bank = 314, post = 315, tavern = 316, market = 317, auction = 318, gate = 319, bakery = 320, meditation = 321, secret = 322, order = 323, fish = 324, swamp = 324, jeweler = 325, ferry = 326, ["connection"] = 300, ["default"] = 301, ["forest"] = 302, ["water"] = 303, ["town"] = 304, ["cave"] = 305, ["fountain"] = 306, ["meadow"] = 307, ["sand"] = 308, ["harbor"] = 309, ["stone"] = 310, ["blacksmith"] = 311, ["shop"] = 312, ["herbalist"] = 313, ["bank"] = 314, ["post"] = 315, ["tavern"] = 316, ["market"] = 317, ["auction"] = 318, ["gate"] = 319, ["bakery"] = 320, ["meditation"] = 321, ["secret"] = 322, ["order"] = 323, ["fish"] = 324, ["swamp"] = 324, ["jeweler"] = 325, ["ferry"] = 326, }
setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.default, 40,40,40,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.forest, 0,85,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.water, 0,0,200,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.town, 100,0,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.cave, 140,140,140,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.fountain, 60,120,205,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.meadow, 34,139,34,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.sand, 218,165,32,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.harbor, 112,138,144,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.stone, 105,105,105,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.blacksmith, 170,85,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.shop, 139,0,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.herbalist, 0,128,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.bank, 184,134,11,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.post, 0,0,128,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.tavern, 150,55,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.market, 178,34,34,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.auction, 139,0,139,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.gate, 100,0,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.bakery, 139,69,0,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.meditation, 75,0,130,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.secret, 128,0,128,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.order, 210,105,30,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.fish, 32,178,170,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.swamp, 79,120,47,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.jeweler, 218,165,32,255) setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.ferry, 30,144,255,255)
--blacksmith, shop, bank, post, zielarz, dylizans, meditation, tavern, skup/targowisko(market), gates, auction house mmp.roomMarks = { fountain = { mmp.envColors.fountain, "F" }, harbor = { mmp.envColors.harbor, "H" }, blacksmith = { mmp.envColors.blacksmith, "K" }, shop = { mmp.envColors.shop, "S" }, herbalist = { mmp.envColors.herbalist, "Z" }, bank = { mmp.envColors.bank, "B" }, post = { mmp.envColors.post, "P" }, tavern = { mmp.envColors.tavern, "T" }, market = { mmp.envColors.market, "m" }, auction = { mmp.envColors.auction, "A" }, gate = { mmp.envColors.auction, "G" }, bakery = { mmp.envColors.bakery, "B" }, meditation = { mmp.envColors.meditation, "M" }, secret = { mmp.envColors.secret, "*" }, order = { mmp.envColors.order, "O" }, fish = { mmp.envColors.fish, "r" }, jeweler = { mmp.envColors.jeweler, "J" }, ferry = { mmp.envColors.ferry, "S" }, ["fountain"] = { mmp.envColors.fountain, "F" }, ["harbor"] = { mmp.envColors.harbor, "H" }, ["blacksmith"] = { mmp.envColors.blacksmith, "K" }, ["shop"] = { mmp.envColors.shop, "S" }, ["herbalist"] = { mmp.envColors.herbalist, "Z" }, ["bank"] = { mmp.envColors.bank, "B" }, ["post"] = { mmp.envColors.post, "P" }, ["market"] = { mmp.envColors.market, "m" }, ["auction"] = { mmp.envColors.auction, "A" }, ["gate"] = { mmp.envColors.gate, "G" }, ["bakery"] = { mmp.envColors.bakery, "B" }, ["meditation"] = { mmp.envColors.meditation, "M" }, ["secret"] = { mmp.envColors.secret, "*" }, ["order"] = { mmp.envColors.order, "O" }, ["fish"] = { mmp.envColors.fish, "r" }, ["ferry"] = { mmp.envColors.ferry, "R" }, }
local main = Geyser.Container:new({x=0,y=0,width="100%",height="100%",name="mapperContainer"})
mmp.mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ name = "mapperScript.mapper", x = "70%", y = 0, -- edit here if you want to move it width = "30%", height = "50%" }, main)
--specific ID function mmp.addRoom(areaId, roomId, x, y, z) if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: area does not exist!\n<reset>") end return false end
--roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) if next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId, x, y, z)) ~= nil then --if roomId ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room already exists!\n<reset>") end --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) return roomId end
addRoom(roomId) setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Room added.\n<reset>") end return roomId end
-- Generated id function mmp.addRoom(areaId, x, y, z) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Adding room \n") end if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: area does not exist!\n<reset>") end return false end
local roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) if roomId ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room already exists!\n<reset>") end --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) return roomId end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Creating Id \n") end if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Coordinates = (" .. x .. ", " .. y .. ", " .. z .. ")\n") end roomId = createRoomID() if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> RoomId = " .. roomId .. "\n") end addRoom(roomId) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room added\n") end setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room created. Setting room area.\n") end setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room area set\n") end
mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Room added.\n<reset>") end return roomId end
function mmp.addArea(areaName) local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName)
if areaId ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: " .. areaName .. " already exists!\n<reset>") end return areaId end
areaId = addAreaName(areaName) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Area added.\n<reset>") end return areaId end
function mmp.areaExists(areaId) if getAreaRooms(areaId) ~= nil then return true else return false end end
function mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId) if gmcp.room.info.exits == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually\n<reset>") end return end
local exits = gmcp.room.info.exits
if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-zachod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.nw, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "polnoc") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.n, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-wschod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.ne, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "wschod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.e, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-wschod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.se, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "poludnie") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.s, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-zachod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.sw, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "zachod") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.w, true) end
-- up and down stubs dont work on the known map (z == 0) if table.contains(exits, "dol") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.down, true) end
if table.contains(exits, "gora") then setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.up, true) end
return true end
function mmp.findAreaID(areaname) local list = getAreaTable() -- iterate over the list of areas, matching them with substring match. -- if we get match a single area, then return it's ID, otherwise return -- 'false' and a message that there are than one are matches
local returnid, fullareaname for area, id in pairs(list) do if area:find(areaname, 1, true) then if returnid then return false, "more than one area matches" end returnid = id; fullareaname = area end end
return returnid, fullareaname end
function mmp.centerView(roomId) centerview(roomId) end
function mmp.connectExitStubs(roomId) local exits = getRoomExits(roomId) local stubs = getExitStubs(roomId) if (type(stubs)) ~= "table" then return end if stubs then for i,v in pairs(stubs) do connectExitStub(roomId, v) end end end
function mmp.connectLastReverse(roomId) local stubs = getExitStubs(roomId) if (type(stubs)) ~= "table" then return end
local lastMoveNo = mmp.exitmap[__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__] if lastMoveNo == nil then return end local lastMoveReversedDir = mmp.exitmapReversed[lastMoveNo] local lastMoveReversedDirNo = mmp.exitmap[lastMoveReversedDir]
if table.contains(stubs, mmp.exitmap[lastMoveReversedDir]) then mmp.connectFromTo(roomId, __LAST_ROOM_ID__, lastMoveReversedDirNo) end end
function mmp.deleteAllStubs(roomId) local exitStubs = getExitStubs(roomId) if type(exitStubs) ~= "table" then return end for i,v in pairs(exitStubs) do setExitStub(roomId, v,false) end end
function mmp.connectFromTo(fromId, toId, directionNo) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Start\n") end if (fromId == nil) or (toId == nil) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> from or to == nil. Returning.\n") end return false end
local exits = getRoomExits(fromId) if exits == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> exits == nil. Returning\n") end return false end
if table.contains(exits, mmp.exitmap[directionNo]) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> exit already exists. Returning\n") end return false end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Adding exit\n") end
-- Check if there is already connection from fromId to toId if mmp.isConnected(fromId, toId) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Rooms are already connected. Returning\n") end
return false end return setExit(fromId, toId, directionNo) end
function mmp.isConnected(fromId, toId)
local exits = getRoomExits(fromId) for direction,num in pairs(exits) do if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> isConnected -> Checking direction = " .. direction .. ", and num = " .. num .. "\n") end if num == toId then return true end end
return false end
function mmp.addSpecialExit(roomFromId, roomToId, exitCommand) if gmcp.room.info.exits == nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually\n<reset>") end return end
if roomExists(roomFromId) == false or roomExists(roomToId) == false then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no romm with a given id\n<reset>") end end
addSpecialExit(roomFromId, roomToId, exitCommand) end
function mmp.commandToExit(cmd) if mmp.dirN[cmd] then return "polnoc" elseif mmp.dirNE[cmd] then return "polnocny-wschod" elseif mmp.dirNW[cmd] then return "polnocny-zachod" elseif mmp.dirE[cmd] then return "wschod" elseif mmp.dirW[cmd] then return "zachod" elseif mmp.dirS[cmd] then return "poludnie" elseif mmp.dirSE[cmd] then return "poludniowy-wschod" elseif mmp.dirSW[cmd] then return "poludniowy-zachod" elseif mmp.dirUp[cmd] then return "gora" elseif mmp.dirDown[cmd] then return "dol" elseif mmp.dirOut[cmd] then return "wyjscie" elseif mmp.dirIn[cmd] then return "wejscie" else return nil end end
function mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) if __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ == nil then __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ = mmp.envColors.default end
if __IS_PAINTING_ON__ then
if mmp.hasMark(roomId) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> setRoomEnvColor -> Room is marked. Returning\n") end return end
setRoomEnv(roomId, __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__) else if not table.contains(mmp.envColors, getRoomEnv(roomId)) then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> setRoomEnvColor -> env not recognized. Changing to default\n") end setRoomEnv(roomId, mmp.envColors.default) end end end
function mmp.hasMark(roomId) local roomChar = getRoomChar(roomId or 0) if (roomChar == "") or (roomChar == "_") then return false else return true end end
function mmp.markRoom(roomId, mark) --__CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ = mmp.envColors[color] local envColor = mmp.roomMarks[mark][1] --echo("Room color = " .. mmp.roomMarks[mark][1] .. "\n") --echo("Room char = " .. mmp.roomMarks[mark][2] .. "\n") local roomMark = mmp.roomMarks[mark][2] setRoomEnv(roomId, envColor) setRoomChar(roomId, roomMark)
end
function mmp.unmarkRoom(roomId) setRoomChar(roomId, "_") end
function mmp.getRoomId(areaId, x, y, z) if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Error: area does not exist!\n<reset>") end return false end
local roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) if roomId ~= nil then return roomId else return nil end
end
function mmp.getAreaId(areaName) local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName) return areaId end

Script.name: readLastCommand
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
rLstCmd = rLstCmd or {}
function readLastCommand(_, command) rLstCmd.storeCommand(command) rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(command) end
function rLstCmd.storeAsCommand(cmd) rLstCmd.storeCommand(cmd) rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(cmd) end
function rLstCmd.storeCommand(cmd) __LAST_COMMAND__ = cmd end
-- Add all commands sent from this location. Clears the queue when new locations is entered (roomChanged) function rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(cmd) if __CMD_LIST__ == nil then __CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end if __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end
if (__IS_MAPPING_ON__ == true) and (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) > 2) then cecho("<yellow>Move will cause coherency lost. Aborting move command.\n") denyCurrentSend() return end
List.pushright(__CMD_LIST__, cmd)
rLstCmd.filterHide(cmd)
local moveCmd = mmp.commandToExit(cmd) if moveCmd ~= nil then if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Size before push = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "\n") end List.pushright(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__, cmd) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Size after push = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "\n") end --rLstCmd.addQueued() --__MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ = __MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ + 1 if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Move command to be written = " .. moveCmd .. "\n") end end
if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Tmp list: \n") display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) cecho("<yellow>Real list: \n") display(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) end
if (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) > 3 then cecho("<yellow>Coherency lost\n") display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) end
-- if coherency lost: --if (__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ ~= nil) and (type(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) == "table") then --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("rLstCmd -> addCmdToQueue -> coherency 1\n") end --local numb = __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ --if (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) > 4 then --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("rLstCmd -> addCmdToQueue -> Coherency lost, number = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "\n") end --return --Add last element (like a stack) --List.pushright(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__, List.popright(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) --__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() --end --end end
function rLstCmd.addQueued() -- queue waiting commands --echo("Adding command if " .. __MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ .. " is equal to 0\n") if (not (__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__.first > __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__.last)) then --cecho("<yellowList before: \n") --display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Size before pop = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "\n") end List.pushright(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__, List.popleft(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Size after pop = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "\n") end --cecho("<yellow>List after: \n") --display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) end end
function rLstCmd.filterHide(cmd) local dir dir, _ = string.gsub(cmd, "^(przemknij sie ", "") end

Script.name: List
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
List = List or {} function List.new () return {first = 0, last = -1} end
function List.pushleft (list, value) local first = list.first - 1 list.first = first list[first] = value end
function List.pushright (list, value) local last = list.last + 1 list.last = last list[last] = value end
function List.popleft (list) local first = list.first if first > list.last then error("list is empty") end local value = list[first] list[first] = nil -- to allow garbage collection list.first = first + 1 return value end
function List.popright (list) local last = list.last if list.first > last then error("list is empty") end local value = list[last] list[last] = nil -- to allow garbage collection list.last = last - 1 return value end

function onConnect() --new mapper __IS_MAPPING_ON__ = false
-- mapper __IS_DEBUG_ON__ = false __IS_MAPPER_MODE_ON__ = false __IS_CONNECT_KNOWN_GMCP_ONLY__ = false
__CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = nil __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited room id __LAST_AREA_ID__ = nil -- last added/visited area __IS_MAPPING_MODE_ON__ = false __IS_TRACKING_ON__ = true
__LAST_AREA_ID__ = nil __LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__ = nil __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = nil __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ = nil __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil --__LAST_COMMAND__ = nil __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = nil
__LAST_POS_X__ = nil __LAST_POS_Y__ = nil __LAST_POS_Z__ = nil
__AREA_WIDTH_OFFSET__ = 120 __AREA_SIZE__ = 2
__CMD_LIST__ = nil --List.new() -- commands within one location __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = nil --List.new() __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = nil __MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ = 0
__CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ = nil __IS_PAINTING_ON__ = false
__IS_GO_ACTIVATED__ = false
__IS_CONNECTING_STUBS__ = false -- if true, stubs are automatically connected, which may cause wrong paths
__IS_KEYS_ACTIVATED__ = false end
